mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blood_pressure (bp_id, member_no, log_date, bp_level, bp_high, bp_low) VALUES (#{bpId}, #{memberNo}, #{log_Date}, #{bpLevel}, #{bpHigh}, #{bpLow})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM blood_pressure WHERE ${searchKey} LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
SELECT * FROM blood_pressure WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY LOG_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE blood_pressure SET log_date = #{log_Date}, bp_level = #{bpLevel}, bp_high = #{bpHigh}, bp_low = #{bpLow}, created_at = SYSDATE where member_no = #{memberNo} and TRUNC(log_date) = TRUNC(#{log_Date})
